testcase.name: Login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given I set user API EndPoint to "https://seller.shipyaari.com/angularapi/login".passed And I set request body as:..................................................passed When I send POST request....................................................passed Then the response status code should be 200.................................passed And the response body should contain "Login Successfully!"..................passed And the response body should have property "result.user_id" with value "5934".passed And the response body should have property "result.full_name" with value "Demo-Tech".passed And the response body should have property "result.email" with value "gaurav.jadhav@shipyaari.com".passed And the response body should have property "result.mobile" with value "7020553391".passed
